description: This Python source file demonstrates how to store agent sessions in a Firestore database, including setup instructions and code to initialize an agent with Firestore storage and DuckDuckGo tools, and to query the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform tasks using specified storage and tools.

classes.name: FirestoreStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions in Firestore database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt.
